survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Noise Reduction Solutions Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction with current workplace noise reduction solutions and identify areas for improvement to enhance productivity and comfort.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current noise levels in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current noise levels in your workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following noise reduction solutions have you used in your workspace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Keep the options concise.

script.question_text: Which of the following noise reduction solutions have you used in your workspace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How effective do you find the noise reduction solutions currently available in your workspace?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 is not 'None of the above'.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How effective do you find the noise reduction solutions currently available in your workspace?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 is not 'None of the above'.

questions.question_text: What additional noise reduction solutions would you recommend for your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unique suggestions. Limit response length to 200 characters.

script.question_text: What additional noise reduction solutions would you recommend for your workspace?

questions.question_text: How often does noise in your workspace disrupt your concentration?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How often does noise in your workspace disrupt your concentration?
